mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_MEMBER (MEMBERNUM, MEMBERID, MEMBERPW, MEMBERNAME, MEMBERTEL, MEMBEREMAIL, MEMBERZIPCODE, MEMBERADDRESS, MEMBERADDRESSDETAIL, MEMBERADDRESSETC, MEMBERSTATUS, MEMBERTYPE) VALUES(MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberTel}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberZipcode}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberAddressDetail}, #{memberAddressEtc}, #{memberStatus}, #{memberType})
